TopicTitle: The light aircraft featured in the KSP Twitter banner

Articles.Content:
Hi,

I really like the pic of the light aircraft, that appears to be flying on Duna, in the KSP Twitter banner. Here it is here:

Can anyone point me to a tread where it's documented / described?

Thanks,

Dave

Edited August 10, 2014 by DaveAZ
I don't believe there is such a thread, but it you have any questions about it I'm sure we could help.

Thanks

Is it made from stock parts? I'm following career mode and haven't ventures into aircraft technology much yet but the wheels and what looks like an open cockpit appear to be from the Field Science node of the tech tree.

I might just go into sandbox mode and try to build it. Will it fly on Kerbin?

It looks like all stock parts, the wheels are actually rover wheels though i don't know why, they break at high speeds. It should fly on kerbin, and you might want to refer to this thread, which is how I learned to build aircraft in KSP. this would probably be better than just copying the onion the pic.
